name: places/ChIJpWUxaolZwokRbda1ttRA5Jk
formattedAddress: 424 Broome St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 424 Broome St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
This review is for the end product vs. the store experience. I left the store with the a positive experience after having to get a custom suit for my friend’s wedding.

The “custom” suit is an absolute mess and joke. For starters, the pants are comically inches above where they need to be literally falling above the ball of my ankle standing up. Picture an adult in children’s bell bottoms.

The jacket along with the pant are also awkwardly skewed, falling in different places on each side of the body.

Customer service for the call was the worst part of it all with the guy I spoke to sounding so exhausted as I imagine he deals with this all the time. No apology given - just basically go get it fixed yourself and we may cover part of the alteration when you submit a receipt.

While the groom warned me he had to get another suit last minute because his was cheap and all wrongly sized as well, I had only mentally prepared for some minor revisions.

What an absolute waste of $700 and with the no refund policy because it is “custom cut” to your body (while being the furthest thing from it), this is going in the BUYER BEWARE SCAM category.

Thankfully I already go to suit supply for my other suits but wish I didn’t need to spend all this money to understand that you should never fall for a custom scam again.

originalText.text: Couldn’t be happier and more excited after getting my first tailored suit at Indochino. The fitting and shopping experience was better than I could have imagined. I had the pleasure of working with Sara who is kind, patient, and beyond knowledgeable. She made me feel comfortable during the fitting and confident in my choices. Now I have a place to go to whenever I need anything suit related. Thanks again to Sara and the entire Indochino team for such a lovely experience. I will be telling all my family and friends about Indochino.

I will be telling all my family and friends about Indochino.

originalText.text: It was my first time ever getting a fully tailored suit and it’s for my wedding. The person who helped me was so kind and thought especially to some insecurities i wanted to hide. They made sure I was comfortable the whole way through and took time to explain things about suits I didn’t know. It was definitely an incredible experience.

They made sure I was comfortable the whole way through and took time to explain things about suits I didn’t know. It was definitely an incredible experience.

originalText.text: Walked in to casually browse and didn’t realize they work with you 1 on 1 so you need to schedule an appointment. After doing so, my experience was great overall. These guys know what they’re doing and can help you make decisions based on any occasion. Super friendly staff, prices were affordable for custom quality suits.

These guys know what they’re doing and can help you make decisions based on any occasion. Super friendly staff, prices were affordable for custom quality suits.

originalText.text: Worked with Usman and had a lovely experience. He helped me match the fabric of a swatch that I brought in and was great about figuring out my suit fit given that I am not a man and have different fit needs because of that. Would definitely come back!
